title: Planet Leap
summary: A fast-paced endless mobile game with over 100.000 downloads. Developed with Unity and C#.

title: GGifs.tv
summary: Desktop application used to crop, upload and share short videos. Built in JavaScript, Go, Electron and FFmpeg.

title: CNN Letter Recognition
summary: Convolutional Neural Network taught to solve Letter Recognition with ~90% accuracy. Created in Python, JavaScript, TensorFlow and Keras.

title: Rising Water
summary: Winning entry in the NASA Space Apps Challenge Zaragoza 2019. Interactive 3D Web visualization tool developed with Python, JavaScript, React and three.js
